com.xamoom.android.xamoomcontentblocks.Adapters

Class ContentBlockAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
      • com.xamoom.android.xamoomcontentblocks.Adapters.ContentBlockAdapter

  • public class ContentBlockAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    ContentBlockAdapter will display all the contentBlocks you get from the xamoom cloud.

      • ContentBlockAdapter

        public ContentBlockAdapter(android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment,

                           boolean showSpotMapContentLinks,
                           java.lang.String youtubeApiKey,
                           ContentBlock3ViewHolder.OnContentBlock3ViewHolderInteractionListener contentBlock3ViewHolderInteractionListener)
        Constructor for the Adapter.
        Parameters:
        fragment - Fragment with the recyclerView in it.
        contentBlocks - ContentBlocks to display.
        showSpotMapContentLinks - Toggle links from your spotmap spots to content.
        youtubeApiKey - Youtube api key from Google Developer Console.
        contentBlock3ViewHolderInteractionListener - Listener for viewHolder3 interactions.
